pr_title: Rename digital twins create APIs to be createOrReplace

timeline.message: Rename digital twins create APIs to be createOrReplace
Rename digital twins create APIs to be createOrReplace

timeline.bodyText:
Same as in .NET, should CreateDigitalTwinOptions be CreateOrReplaceDigitalTwinOptions, esp since etag is a part of these options?
@timtay-microsoft Let me know if this has been discussed already, I might have missed it.
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: Yes, good catch. I'll update these options objects as well
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
